## Checklist
<!-- Ensure all items are checked before submitting -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No console.log or debug statements left
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] Logging added for important operations

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] Inline code documentation added
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated

### Testing
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Edge cases tested
- [ ] Error scenarios tested

### Security
- [ ] Security checklist reviewed
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets
- [ ] Dependencies updated (if needed)
- [ ] npm audit shows no vulnerabilities

### CI/CD
- [ ] CI pipeline passes
- [ ] Build successful
- [ ] No linting errors
- [ ] Code coverage maintained/improved

## Additional Notes
<!-- Any additional information for reviewers -->



## Reviewer Guidelines
<!-- For reviewers -->

### Focus Areas
- [ ] Code logic and correctness
- [ ] Security implications
- [ ] Performance considerations
- [ ] Test coverage
- [ ] Documentation completeness
- [ ] Database migration safety
- [ ] XRPL transaction safety

### Review Checklist
- [ ] Code reviewed
- [ ] Tests reviewed
- [ ] Documentation reviewed
- [ ] Security reviewed
- [ ] Approved for merge

---

**Branch naming convention**: `feature/<issue>-short-description` or `bugfix/<issue>-short-description`

**Commit message format**: `type(scope): description` (e.g., `feat(auth): add JWT refresh tokens`)
